entry.summary: On a wet and hot night

entry.title: Switzerland
entry.content:
Mt. Matterhorn. Itâ€™s not easy to see it completely.

Zurich
ETH!!!
There was sudden stormâ„ on Oberalppass
Kun in front of Mt. Matterhorn ğŸ˜ğŸ˜ğŸ˜! (the top of the mountain got hided though)
Aletsch Glacier under JungfraujochğŸ”
Kun's finger from Grindelwald ğŸ˜ğŸ˜ğŸ˜
Montreux

entry.title: Impression of Turin
entry.content:
An overview of the Turin city. The tallest building in the middle is the Mole Antonelliana (currently used as the National Film Museum).

The Turin Palace (Palazzo Reale)
Turin in the rain
ğŸ˜ğŸ˜ğŸ˜
Reggia di Venaria Reale
Muzeo Egizio in Turin is the largest Egyptian Museum outside Egypt (actually the second largest around the world)
I attended LREC-COLING 2024 from May 20th to 25th in Turin. This is my first conference!
The countryside near the northern border of Italy (shot on the train from Turin to Swizerland)

entry.title: Impression of Milan
entry.content:
Duomo di Milano. I stayed in Milan for one day (May 19th) after arriving in Italy, and then went to Turin for the conference.

The Alps from the air before landing in Malpensa Airport of Milan!
The inner view of Duomo di Milano
Italian people exactly know how to enjoy life on a sunny weekend day! (Shot near Castello Sforzesco)
In front of the triumphal arch in Milan (Arco della Pace / Arch of Peace)
